trans-unit.source: dotnet-restore command | .NET Core SDK
trans-unit.target: dotnet-restore 命令 | .NET Core SDK

trans-unit.source: Learn how to restore dependencies and project-specific tools with the dotnet restore command
trans-unit.target: 了解如何使用 dotnet-restore 命令还原依赖项和特定于项目的工具

trans-unit.source: dotnet-restore, CLI, CLI command, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: dotnet-restore, CLI, CLI 命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-restore
trans-unit.target: dotnet-restore

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名称

trans-unit.source: `dotnet-restore` - Restores the dependencies and tools of a project
trans-unit.target: `dotnet-restore` - 恢复项目的依赖项和工具

trans-unit.source: Synopsis
trans-unit.target: 摘要

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet restore` command uses NuGet to restore dependencies as well as project-specific tools that are specified in the [project.json](project-json.md) file.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet restore` 命令使用 NuGet 还原依赖项以及在 [project.json](project-json.md) 文件中指定的特定于项目的工具。

trans-unit.source: By default, the restoration of dependencies and tools are done in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，并行完成对依赖项和工具的还原。

trans-unit.source: In order to restore the dependencies, NuGet needs the feeds where the packages are located.
trans-unit.target: 为了还原依赖项，NuGet 需要包所在的源。

trans-unit.source: Feeds are usually provided via the NuGet.config configuration file; a default one is present when the CLI tools are installed.
trans-unit.target: 常常通过 NuGet.config 配置文件提供源；安装 CLI 工具时存在一个默认源。

trans-unit.source: You can specify more feeds by creating your own NuGet.config file in the project directory.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在项目目录中创建自己的 NuGet.config 文件来指定多个源。

trans-unit.source: Feeds can also be specified per invocation on the command prompt.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还可以在每次针对命令提示符进行调用时指定源。

trans-unit.source: For dependencies, you can specify where the restored packages are placed during the restore operation using the `--packages` argument.
trans-unit.target: 对于依赖项，可以使用 `--packages` 参数指定还原操作期间放置还原包的位置。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default NuGet package cache is used.
trans-unit.target: 如未指定，则使用默认的 NuGet 包缓存。

trans-unit.source: It is found in the `.nuget/packages` directory in the user's home directory on all operating systems (for example, */home/user1* on Linux or *C:\Users\user1* on Windows).
trans-unit.target: 可在所有操作系统上的用户主目录（例如，Linux 上的 */home/user1* 或 Windows 上的 *C:\Users\user1*）中的 `.nuget/packages` 目录找到它。

trans-unit.source: For project-specific tooling, `dotnet restore` first restores the package in which the tool is packed, and then proceeds to restore the tool's dependencies as specified in its [project.json](project-json.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于特定于项目的工具，`dotnet restore` 首先还原打包工具所在的包，然后继续还原 [project.json](project-json.md) 中指定的工具依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: 选项

trans-unit.source: A list of projects or project folders to restore.
trans-unit.target: 要还原的项目或项目文件夹的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each value can be a path to a [project.json](project-json.md) or [global.json](global-json.md) file, or to a folder.
trans-unit.target: 每个值可以是 [project.json](project-json.md) 或 [global.json](global-json.md) 文件路径或文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: If a folder is specified, the restore operation will recursively search for a [project.json](project-json.md) file in all subdirectories and restores for each [project.json](project-json.md) file found.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定文件夹，还原操作会以递归方式搜索所有子目录中的 [project.json](project-json.md) 文件并还原找到的每个 [project.json](project-json.md) 文件。

trans-unit.source: Prints out a short help for the command.
trans-unit.target: 打印出有关命令的简短帮助。

trans-unit.source: Forces the application to run using an invariant, English-based culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用固定的、基于英语的区域性强制运行应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a NuGet package source to use during the restore operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在还原操作期间使用的 NuGet 包源。

trans-unit.source: This overrides all of the sources specified in the NuGet.config file(s).
trans-unit.target: 这会替代 NuGet.config 文件中指定的所有源。

trans-unit.source: Multiple sources can be provided by specifying this option multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 多次指定此选项可以提供多个源。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directory to place the restored packages in.
trans-unit.target: 指定放置还原包的目录。

trans-unit.source: Disables restoring multiple projects in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 禁用并行还原多个项目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of packages sources to use as a fallback in the restore operation if all other sources fail.
trans-unit.target: 指定其他所有源失败时要在还原操作中用作回退的包源列表。

trans-unit.source: All valid feed formats are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许所有有效的源格式。

trans-unit.source: Multiple fallback sources can be provided by specifying this option multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 多次指定此选项可以提供多个回退源。

trans-unit.source: The NuGet configuration file (NuGet.config) to use for the restore operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于还原操作的 NuGet 配置文件 (NuGet.config)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies to not cache packages and HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 指定不缓存包和 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: Temporary option to allow NuGet to infer Runtime Identifiers (RIDs) for legacy repositories.
trans-unit.target: 允许 NuGet 推断旧存储库的运行时标识符 (RID) 的临时选项。

trans-unit.source: The verbosity of logging to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的日志记录的详细级别。

trans-unit.source: Allowed values: `Debug`, `Verbose`, `Information`, `Minimal`, `Warning`, or `Error`.
trans-unit.target: 允许的值：`Debug`、`Verbose`、`Information`、`Minimal`、`Warning` 或 `Error`。

trans-unit.source: Only warn about failed sources if there are packages meeting version requirement.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在符合版本要求的包，则源失败时警告。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.target: 还原当前目录中项目的依赖项和工具：

trans-unit.target: 还原在给定路径中找到的 `app1` 项目的依赖项和工具：

trans-unit.target: 通过将提供的文件路径用作回退源，在当前目录中还原项目的依赖项和工具：

trans-unit.source: Restore the dependencies and tools for the project in the current directory using the two file paths provided as the fallback sources:
trans-unit.target: 通过将提供的两个文件路径用作回退源，还原当前目录中项目的依赖项和工具：

trans-unit.source: Restore dependencies and tools for the project in the current directory and shows only errors in the output:
trans-unit.target: 还原当前目录中项目的依赖项和工具并仅显示输出中的错误：
